headerTitle: Kuu Awoodsiinta Ilaalinta Xogtaada Shakhsiga ah & Asturnaantaada
headerSubtitle: DPA waxay halkan u joogtaa sidii xaqaaga loo ilaalin lahaa. Hoos ka akhriso khataraha asturnaanta caadiga ah iyo sida aad naftaada u ilaalin karto.
spamLinksRisk: Xiriirro khatar leh oo baraha bulshada sida Facebook waxay horseedi karaan weeraro phishing, rakibidda malware, ama xadgudub xog.
spamLinksTips: Ka fogow gujinta xiriirro ama xayeysiisyo aan la hubin
Hawlgeli filtarrada spam-ka ee browser-kaaga ama iimaylkaaga
Cusbooneysii aaladahaaga iyo software-ka ka hortagga fayrasyada
Ku soo sheeg xiriirrada waxyeellada leh madalaha
identityTheftRisk: Khayaano-yaal ayaa isku dayi kara inay kugu weekstaan baraha bulshada si ay u helaan lacagahaaga ama xiriiradaada.
identityTheftTips: Isticmaal erayo sir ah oo xooggan oo u gaar ah akoon kasta
Ku soo sheeg isku dayo gelitaan oo shaki leh
spamTextRisk: Farriimaha Facebook, WhatsApp, ama Messenger waxay ka koobnaan karaan xiriirro khatar ah.
spamTextTips: Iska indho tir oo xannib farriimaha ka imanaya dirayaal aan la aqoon
Ka fogow gujinta xiriirrada aan la xaqiijin
Ku soo sheeg spam-ka madalaha ku habboon
keepingPersonalInfoRisk: Akoonkaaga bangiga, aqoonsiga qaranka, baasaboorka, iyo dukumentiyada kale waa kuwo xasaasi ah.
keepingPersonalInfoTips: Waligaa ha wadaagin xogtaas si furan ama online
Keydi dukumentiyada adag meel ammaan ah
Isticmaal madalaha sirta ah iyo erayo sir ah oo xooggan
Ka fogow dirista xogta shakhsiga ah kanaallo aan ammaan ahayn
nuisanceCallsRisk: Wicitaanno aan loo baahnayn ama khayaano ah waxay waxyeello u geysan karaan asturnaantaada.
nuisanceCallsTips: Ka ilaali lambarkaaga taleefanka si qarsoodi ah oo iska ilaali wadaagga aan loo baahnayn
Isticmaal qalabka xanniba wicitaanada ama apps
Ku soo sheeg wicitaannada joogtada ah ama khiyaanada ah bixiyahaaga adeegga iyo DPA
Waligaa ha wadaagin xog xasaasi ah wicitaan ahaan
phishingMessagesRisk: Dembiyaal internet ayaa soo dira farriimo been abuur ah oo sheeganaya inay ka yimaadeen ilo lagu kalsoon yahay.
phishingMessagesTips: Ha gujin xiriirrada ama ha furin lifaaqyada ka imanaya dirayaal aan la aqoon
Xaqiiji saxnaanta farriinta ka hor inta aadan macluumaad wadaagin
Isticmaal filtarrada spam-ka oo cusbooneysii goobaha amniga iimaylka
otpRisk: OTP-gaaga waa furaha marin ammaan ah.
otpTips: Ha wadaagin OTP-ga qofna – xitaa saaxiib ama qoys
Keliya geli OTP-ga goobaha lagu kalsoon yahay
Ka digtoonow wicitaanno ama farriimo codsanaya OTP-gaaga
Hawlgeli xaqiijinta laba-tallaabo dhammaan akoonyada xasaasiga ah
handlingBankLines: Asturnaanta Meelaha Dadweynaha (tusaale, Bangiyo ama Iskuulo)
handlingBankLinesRisk: Ka fiirso deegaankaaga marka aad gelayso ama ka hadleyso xog gaar ah.
handlingBankLinesTips: Ka fogow ka hadalka arrimaha shaqsiga ah ama dhaqaale cod sare
Adeegso adeegyada online si aad u yarayso muujinta
Ka ilaali dukumentiyada iyo aaladahaaga in la arko meel fagaare ah
schoolIDandCertsRisk: Kaarkaaga iskuulka iyo shahaadooyinkaagu waa qeyb ka mid ah aqoonsigaaga.
schoolIDandCertsTips: Ha wadaagin online ama la wadaagin cid aan la aqoon
Keydi nuqul adag meel ammaan ah
Hay nuqullo dijital ah oo sir lagu ilaaliyo
publicInfoSecurityRisk: Diiwaannada caafimaadku waa xasaasi aadna u ilaalsan sharci ahaan.
publicInfoSecurityTips: La wadaag xirfadlayaasha caafimaadka ee shatiyeysan ama hay’adaha la xaqiijiyay
Ka fogow daabacaadda xogta caafimaadka online
Isticmaal madalaha dijital ah ee ammaan ah iyo erayo sir ah oo adag
protectingHealthRecordsRisk: Diiwaannada caafimaadku waa xasaasi aadna u ilaalsan sharci ahaan.
protectingHealthRecordsTips: La wadaag kaliya xirfadlayaasha ruqsadda leh ama hay’adaha la aqoonsan yahay
Ka fogow daabacaadda ama gudbinta xogta caafimaadka online
Isticmaal madalaha dijital ah ee ammaan ah iyo erayo sir ah oo adag
ctaDesc: Haddii xogtaada shaqsiyeed si khaldan loo isticmaalo, aad hesho isgaarsiin shaki leh, ama aad dhibane u noqoto xadgudub xogeed, isla markiiba la xiriir DPA.
